title: Zero Hour
resume: As the publisher of Modern Skeptic Magazine, Hank Galliston has spent  his career following clues, debunking myths and cracking conspiracies.  But when his beautiful wife, Laila, is abducted from  her antique clock shop, Hank gets pulled into one of the most compelling  mysteries in human history, stretching around the world and back  centuries.
